To-Do List Website - Comet Tasks
Project Name: Comet Tasks

Project Type: Website (Responsive Web Application)

Requirements:

Build a modern, user-friendly to-do list web application called "MoCo Tasks" that helps users organize their daily tasks efficiently.

Core Features:

Task Management: Users should be able to add, edit, delete, and mark tasks as complete
Task Organization: Support for categorizing tasks with labels/tags (e.g., Work, Personal, Shopping)
Priority Levels: Allow users to set task priorities (High, Medium, Low) with visual indicators
Due Dates: Add optional due dates to tasks with overdue warnings
Search & Filter: Quick search functionality and filtering by status, priority, and category
Persistent Storage: Tasks should be saved locally (browser localStorage) so they persist across sessions
Dark Mode: Toggle between light and dark themes
Responsive Design: Works seamlessly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
User Experience:

Clean, minimalist interface with smooth animations
Keyboard shortcuts for power users (e.g., Ctrl+N for new task, Ctrl+Enter to save)
Drag-and-drop to reorder tasks
Celebration animation when completing tasks
Progress indicator showing completion percentage
Technical Preferences:

Modern JavaScript (ES6+)
CSS with glassmorphism design style
No backend required initially (100% client-side)
Fast loading time (under 2 seconds)
Nice-to-Have Features:

Task statistics dashboard showing productivity trends
Recurring tasks functionality
Export tasks as JSON
Print-friendly view

functional_requirements.description: Multi-step checkout process for completing a purchase.
acceptance_criteria: Users can enter shipping and billing addresses.
Users can select a payment method and enter payment details securely.
Users can review their order before confirming the purchase.
Users receive an order confirmation after a successful transaction.

functional_requirements.description: Backend interface for site administrators to manage the store.
acceptance_criteria: Admins can add, edit, and delete products and categories.
Admins can view and manage customer orders.
Admins can view basic sales reports and analytics.
Admins can manage user accounts.

non_functional_requirements.description: The application must protect customer data and payment information. All transactions must be secure.
metrics: PCI DSS compliance for payment processing.
Protection against OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities (e.g., XSS, SQL Injection).

non_functional_requirements.description: The website must be fast and responsive, especially during high traffic periods, to prevent loss of sales.

metrics: System should support 10,000 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Horizontal scaling capabilities to add more servers on demand.

non_functional_requirements.description: The website must be easy to use and accessible on various devices to provide a good user experience and maximize conversions.
metrics: Responsive design that works on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Checkout process completion rate greater than 70%.

risks: Security breaches leading to loss of customer data and trust.
Payment gateway integration issues causing transaction failures.
Poor performance and scalability during peak traffic leading to lost revenue.
High cart abandonment rates due to a complicated checkout process.
Challenges in managing inventory and order fulfillment logistics.
assumptions: Third-party payment gateways (e.g., Stripe, PayPal) will be used for payment processing.
